original: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān śuddhāvāsopari-gaganatala-pratiṣṭhite sapta-ratna pravibha kta-vicitra-ratna-vyūhe mahā-maṇḍalamāḍe  #
analyzed: evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān śuddhāvāsa upari gagana tala pratiṣṭhite sapta ratna pravibhakta vicitra ratna vyūhe mahā maṇḍalam āḍe

original: tatra khalu bhagavān bodhisa[t]tvān āmantrayate sma ||
analyzed: tatra khalu bhagavān bodhisattvān āmantrayate sma

original: udgṛhṇīdhavaṃ yūyaṃ kulaputrā imāṃ ṣaṇmukhī-nāma-dhāraṇīṃ sarva-jagad-dhitārthaṃ ||
analyzed: udgṛhṇīdhavam yūyam kula putrāḥ imām ṣaṇmukhī nāmadhāraṇīm sarva jagat hita artham

original: saṃsāre saṃsarato yo me kaścid duḥkhā nubhavaḥ sa mā bhūt sa rva samatā'pratisaṃvidita- lakṣa ṇaḥ | [2]
analyzed: saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ yaḥ me kaścid duḥkha anubhavaḥ sa mā bhūt

original: yaś ca me kaścil laukika-sampatti-sukhānubhavaḥ sa bhavatu sarva-sa[t]tva-sādhāraṇa-pa ribhogaḥ | [3]
analyzed: yaḥ ca me kaścid laukika sampatti sukha anubhavaḥ sa bhavatu sarva sattva sādhāraṇa pa ribhogaḥ

original: yac ca me kiñcit pāpa-karm[ā]kuśala-mūlaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ tan mā bhūd
analyzed: yat ca me kiñcid pāpa karma akuśala mūlam karma āvaraṇam tat mā bhūt

original: yāni ca me māra-karmāṇi tāni mā bhūvann aparijñātāny anuttarayā parijñayā |[5]
analyzed: yāni ca me māra karmāṇi tāni mā bhūvan a parijñātāni anuttarayā parijñayā

original: yac ca me kiñcit pāramitopasaṃhi taṃ kuśala-mūlaṃ laukika-lokottaraṃ vā tad bhavatu sarva-sa[t]tvānām anuttara-jñānaṃ | [6]
analyzed: yat ca me kiñcid pāramitā upasaṃhi tam kuśala mūlam laukika lokottaram vā tat bhavatu sarva sattvānām anuttara jñānam

original: yā ca me vimuktiḥ sā bhavatu sarva-sa[t]tva-vimokṣāya |
analyzed: yā ca me vimuktiḥ sā bhavatu sarva sattva vimokṣāya

original: mā ca me bhūt saṃsāre nirvāṇe prati-ṣṭhitatā ||
analyzed: mā ca me bhūt saṃsāre nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhita tā

original: yaḥ kaścit kulapu tro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ ṣaṇmukhī-nāma-dhāraṇīṃ triṣ-kṛtvā rātres triṣ-kṛtvā divasya cānuvar (t)
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid kula pu traḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām ṣaṇmukhī nāmadhāraṇīm triṣkṛtvā rātreḥ triṣkṛtvā divasya
tayiṣyati sa sarva karmāṇi kṣepayitvā kṣīpram

original: ||idam avoc d bha gavān ātta-manās te ca bodhisa[t]tvā mahāsa[t]tvā bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti ||
analyzed: idam avoc bha gavān ātta manāḥ te ca bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam abhyanandan iti
